Author: dragaynite
Text: The hair loss is honestly the worst thing for me about this disorder. Not the fact I’m completely destroying my body, but my hair looking dull and lifeless. I’m sure the bob looks super cute tho!! Also, I’m no health/hair expert but I think people have success with biotin and protein/healthy fats in their diets. I survive on carbs and caffeine tho so I’m not sure if that would work with a high deficit

Author: lauryleah
Text: fuck. this is me. i literally cut my hair into a bob a month before my ed habits got really bad and i had such long & thick hair... I'm really worried it's never coming back now
